name: Asteroid Belt (Cross Gen Games)
description:
Enjoy an arcade style space shooter in which you try to get as many points as you can by collecting coins and shooting asteroids.  

  1. Coins = 1 point
  2. Big asteroids = 5 points
  3. Small asteroids = 10 points

Spaceship will go forward on its own you just need to steer and shoot.

Keyboard Controls:

A = turn left

D = turn right

Shift = speed boost

Spacebar = shoot laser

Escape = restart game

X-Box Controls:

D-Pad Left = turn left

D-Pad Right = turn right

A = speed boost

Right Trigger = shoot laser

Spacebar = shoot laser

Escape = restart game
